home.title: Explore and Share Smart Skills
home.subtitle: An open marketplace where developers can easily discover, share, and integrate various smart skills into their applications

search.title: Smart Search
search.desc: Quickly find the skills you need, with keyword search and category filtering

quality.desc: Community-driven quality evaluation system to ensure every skill is verified

docs.desc: Each skill comes with detailed usage documentation and sample code

admin.userRequiredFields: Username, email, and password are required

role.adminDesc: Has full access to all system functions

admin.permissionNameHint: Permission name, usually in format: resource_action, e.g. skill_create

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: BotSkill is committed to building an open and shared skills ecosystem. We believe that by standardizing and modularizing various smart skills, we can greatly lower the threshold for technology integration, allowing developers to focus more on core business logic and accelerate innovation.

plugAndPlay.title: Plug and Play
plugAndPlay.desc: Standardized APIs that can be integrated into your application in just a few simple steps

quality.desc: Strict review mechanisms and community evaluation systems to ensure skill quality

community.title: Community Driven
community.desc: Maintained by the developer community with continuous optimization and skill updates

oneClickDeploy.title: One-Click Deployment
oneClickDeploy.desc: Supports multiple deployment methods to meet different environment requirements

easyPublish.title: Easy Publishing
easyPublish.desc: Simple publishing workflow that allows developers to easily share skills

documentation.desc: Detailed usage documentation and examples to reduce learning costs

team.title: Team Introduction
team.description: BotSkill was founded by a group of engineers who love technology and are dedicated to promoting developer ecosystem development. We have rich technical expertise and product experience, focusing on creating the highest quality skill sharing platform.

joinUs.title: Join the BotSkill Ecosystem
joinUs.description: Whether you are a user looking for skills or a developer willing to share skills, BotSkill welcomes your participation

common.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this? This action cannot be undone.

editor.insertImageDesc: Upload an image or enter an image URL
editor.imageFormatHint: Supports JPG, PNG, GIF, etc., max 5MB

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Your feedback and suggestions are always welcome
contact.feedbackDesc: Submit your feedback through the form below
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.submitSuccess: Message sent! We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: BotSkill ("we", "our", or "this platform") is committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.

dataCollection.title: 2. Information Collection
dataCollection.content: We may collect the following types of information:
dataCollection.item1: Account information: username, email address, password (encrypted storage)
dataCollection.item2: Profile information: name, avatar, bio, and other optional information
dataCollection.item3: Usage data: access records, download records, search history, etc.
dataCollection.item4: Technical information: IP address, browser type, device information, etc.

dataUse.title: 3. Information Use
dataUse.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
dataUse.item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
dataUse.item4: Analyze usage to improve user experience
dataUse.item5: Detect and prevent fraud, abuse, and security issues

dataSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information in the following circumstances:
dataSharing.item2: Legal requirements or in response to legal proceedings
dataSharing.item3: To protect our rights, property, or security
dataSharing.item4: Sharing with service providers (subject to confidentiality agreements)

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information, including encrypted transmission, secure storage, and access controls. However, no method of internet transmission or storage is 100% secure.

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
yourRights.item1: Access, update, or delete your personal information

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience, analyze usage, and provide personalized content. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.

changes.title: 8. Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Significant changes will be notified via email or website announcements. Continued use of our services indicates your acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please contact us through:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the BotSkill platform ("Service"), you agree to be bound by and comply with these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our Service.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: BotSkill is a skill sharing platform that allows users to discover, download, and publish skills. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate the Service at any time without prior notice.

account.title: 3. User Accounts
account.content: Creating an account is required for certain features. You agree to:
account.item1: Provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date information
account.item2: Maintain the security and confidentiality of your account information
account.item3: Be responsible for all activities under your account
account.item4: Immediately notify us of any unauthorized use

userContent.title: 4. User Content
userContent.content: You retain all rights to the content you upload to the platform. By uploading content, you grant us:
userContent.item1: A license to use, copy, distribute, and display the content worldwide
userContent.item2: The right to modify content to adapt it to the platform format
userContent.item3: The right to remove content that violates these terms

prohibited.title: 5. Prohibited Conduct
prohibited.item1: Upload illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, or otherwise objectionable content
prohibited.item2: Infringe on any third party's intellectual property rights
prohibited.item3: Distribute malware, viruses, or other harmful code
prohibited.item4: Attempt unauthorized access to systems or data
prohibited.item5: Interfere with or disrupt the normal operation of the Service

intellectualProperty.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The platform and all its content (including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, and software) are the property of BotSkill or its content providers, protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

disclaimer.title: 7. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The Service is provided "as is" and "as available". We do not guarantee that the Service will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free. We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to the Service at any time without prior notice, including but not limited to violations of these Terms of Service.

changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Significant changes will be notified via email or website announcements. Continued use of the Service indicates your acceptance of the modified terms.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through:

platform.title: Platform License
platform.content: The BotSkill platform itself is copyright protected, all rights reserved. No part of the platform may be copied, modified, distributed, or used without explicit written permission.

skills.title: Skill Licenses
skills.content: Skills published on the platform may use different licenses. Each skill should clearly state its license in the SKILL.md file. Common licenses include:
skills.mit: Allows commercial and non-commercial use, modification, and distribution
skills.apache: Similar to MIT, but includes patent grant
skills.gpl: Requires derivative works to also use GPL license
skills.bsd: Allows use but requires copyright notice retention

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.content: As a user, you have the right to:
userRights.item1: Download and use skills in accordance with their licenses
userRights.item2: View the source code of skills (if provided)
userRights.item3: Modify and distribute skills according to their licenses

publisherRights.title: Publisher Rights
publisherRights.item1: Retain all rights to the skills you publish
publisherRights.item2: May choose any open source or proprietary license
publisherRights.item3: May update or delete your skills at any time
publisherRights.item4: Are responsible for the content you publish, ensuring no infringement of third-party rights

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.content: All users and publishers must comply with:
compliance.item1: Respecting the license terms of each skill
compliance.item2: Complying with all applicable laws and regulations when using skills
compliance.item3: Not publishing skills that infringe on others' intellectual property
compliance.item4: Clearly stating license information in skills

violations.title: License Violations
violations.content: If we discover any license violations, we reserve the right to:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about licenses or need to report violations, please contact us through:

footer.description: Bridging developers and smart skills, making technology more accessible.
